# `/packstack` Command
Prints client or server pack stack to chat

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Any</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>No</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### `/packstack <stackType: stackType> [verbose: verbose] [exclude-vanilla: exclude-vanilla]`

## Arguments
- `exclude-vanilla`: exclude-vanilla
- `stackType`: stackType
- `verbose`: verbose

## Enums
### `stackType`

#### Values
- `server`
- `client`
